subject: Re: [junit] Re: Learning JUnit
msgSnippet: ... Let us know how that goes, and good luck. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info Your guide to software craftsmanship JUnit Recipes:
messageBody:
Vijay wrote:

> Thank you J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger, Simon and Dianne. I will go by your
> recommendations. Initially, the participants will only go through JUnit
> course.
>
> After they are comfortable with JUnit, I intend to add other useful
> modules like DBUnit, Selenium, etc.

Let us know how that goes, and good luck.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
